headline: Huntington Bancshares (HBAN): Among the Best Regional Bank Dividend Stocks to Buy
summary: We recently published a list of the 11 Best Regional Bank Dividend Stocks to Buy. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Huntington Bancshares Incorporated (NASDAQ:HBAN) stands against other best regional bank dividend stocks. The year 2024 proved to be a strong one for major US banks, with the six largest […]
